segments.advisor_message: So, let’s dive into your retirement plans. What are you imagining for that time in your life?
segments.client_message: Oh, um, yeah. So, like, I’ve been thinking about it a lot, you know? I wanna, like, travel a bit and, um, maybe get a little place by the beach. I dunno, I just feel like, you know, I’ve worked really hard and, like, I wanna enjoy it? But then, there’s also the, uh, expenses. Like, the mortgage or, like, insurance stuff, I guess, um, I mean, that could be, like, monthly, I think? And, um, I want it to be, like, essential, you know, not too much stress on the money side? It’d be cool to plan that out till, like, I don’t know, 2035 or something. I just want it to not be too much hassle!
